original_text: and every armed man of you will pass over the Jordan before the Lord, until he has driven out his enemies from before him
korean_text: 너희가 다 무장하고 여호와 앞에서 요단을 건너가서 여호와께서 그의 원수를 자기 앞에서 쫓아내시고

sentences.original_text: and every armed man of you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 중 무장한 모든 사람은

sentences.original_text: until he has driven out his enemies
